descriptions:
['DescriptionWe are pleased to offer this stunning two-bedroom apartment with refined fixtures and contemporary design in the Address Sky views, Tower 1, Downtown Dubai.
This elegant suite has two bedrooms with a spacious balcony looking over the incredible view of the sea and Panoramic Dubai Skyline.
The open plan unit has a  modern kitchen with a breakfast counter and looks over in the large living room with beautiful views. The beautiful bespoke furnishings details add to the contemporary look and while the views enrich the living experience of the residents. The spacious bedrooms come with walk-in and wall closets.
Welcome to the Brand new, Ultra High End, Address Skyviews Tower 1. This apartment is ready to move in today! Fully furnished, serviced, and allowing a five-star lifestyle.
This magnificent new Address - perhaps the best so far -is almost ready to welcome its residents into its luxurious fold This furnished two-bedroom is located on a high floor allowing sweeping views of the sea and Dubai Skyline- and at AED 2.5million  - allows you access to the highest levels of luxury. Floor to ceiling windows allows optimal light. An open plan kitchen allows for contemporary living. The balcony extends across the breadth of the apartment with access from the lounge and the bedrooms.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property.']

location1: ['Whispering PinesDubai, Jumeirah Golf Estates, Earth']
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Built in Wardrobes

Shared Spa
Study']
descriptions:
["DescriptionLUXHABITAT are pleased to present this front-entry Muirfield villa features a spacious lounge with adjoining dining room which leads to a galley style kitchen. A large ground floor guest study cum bedroom benefits from an expansive front-facing bay window.
On the first floor, a well appointed Master Bedroom with views to the rear garden features an oversized walk-in wardrobe. Two additional large bedrooms, both with en-suite bathroom, complete the first floor accommodation.
The property is fronted by a two car garage with covered golf cart port and charging station. The generous rear garden is nicely landscaped with plunge pool.
The villa also includes an under the stairs laundry room and storage, a powder room with shower and maid's accommodation with dedicated external side entrance.
This family villa sits directly on the PGA  World Championship Earth Course with picture perfect greener than green fairways and pure white sand traps. Living in this stunning villa will feel more like Augusta, USA than Dubai, UAE.
Jumeirah Golf Estates is rapidly becoming the sought after, luxury villa development in Dubai. With two Championship Golf Courses, state of the art practice/training facilities and a brand new Country Club, Jumeirah Golf Estates is ideally located just 10 minutes drive from schools and popular landmarks including DIFC/Downtown Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, Mall Of The Emirates and Dubai Marina etc."]

Dubai International city is a country-themed architecture of residences, business, and tourist attractions. Spreading over an area of 800 hectares (8 million square meters), the arrangement of the city is inspired by the traditional carpets of the Middle East. Once completed, the project will contain studio and one-bedroom apartments and accommodate over 12,000 residents.
It is composed of 485 buildings embraces the residential districts of Central Business District (CBD), Persia, Greece, Spain, Morocco, England, France, Italy, Russia, China and Emirates. Apart from these districts that were initially planned for Dubai International City namely Lake District and Forbidden City are now on put on hold due to the effects of the Global Financial Recession.']

title_advert: ['This villa has been exceptionally well-maintained']
location1: ['Bromellia\n                              4.6\n/51 ReviewsDubai, Al Barari, Al Barari Villas']
descriptions:
["DescriptionThis Beautiful Bromellia has been re-designed throughout with its neutral colours flowing from ground to first-floor bedroom levels. The property is sold completely furnished and has been maintained exceptionally well. It also comes with its own private cinema and backs on to the botanical garden. The property sits on a 14,600 sqft plot.
The entrance of this villa defines opulence with its high ceilings and large rooms. The ground floor of this luxury property is home to a large kitchen that is connected to the family living and dining room. The formal areas of this floor are connected to the family area by large three-meter high oak pocket doors. This floor is also home to one of the villa's master suites - this ground floor master suite even has its own private plunge pool in a secluded area of the garden.
This residential, cultural and cosmopolitan community is a one-of-a-kind in Dubai as the only development with more than 60% of the area devoted to open spaces, landscaped gardens, lakes, and waterways, walking tracks and community facilities.
The property can be vacant on transfer and is available to view immediately."]

Spanning the tower complex is a unique Sky Bridge, which includes a signature restaurant, ballroom, infinity pool with amenity deck, offering 360-degree vistas of Downtown Dubai and panoramic views of the Gulf.The Address Residences Sky View is set to become another compelling landmark in the city. The towers serve as a perfect complement to the thriving world-class lifestyle in Downtown Dubai, and will be linked directly to the Dubai Metro and The Dubai Mall via the air-conditioned travelator.\xa0Spanning the tower complex is a unique Sky Bridge, which includes a signature restaurant, ballroom, infinity pool with amenity deck, offering 360-degree vistas of Downtown Dubai and panoramic views of the Gulf.Address Residences Sky View, at a height of over 230 m, brings a new dimension to spatial design to Downtown Dubai.
